website_summaries.verdict: A great, spacious telescope bag that offers great protection for traveling.
pros: This soft carrying case has sufficient padding for storing your scope and great protection for transporting it
Trusted by reviewers to protect expensive scopes
Handle straps not centered on purpose to balance when carrying it and long enough to use as a shoulder strap
Well-made from heavy, water-resistant polyester/nylon material
cons: Minimalist construction lacks accessory pockets or internal divider

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the bag I have the Orion XT8 plus with ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the bag I have the Orion XT8 plus with the 9x50 Finder scope on it sticks out 7 inches from the scope and it still fits in the bag the bag has room to spare The scope itself measures 47 inches long and the bag has another inch maybe two if you plan on transporting your scope it's a great investment to protect your investment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious but needs pockets and dividers
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious but no pockets or dividers. I would have liked more of that for all the gear that I don't want scratched, such as the tube of my telescope by the equilateral mount and tripod. Forced to use spare pillow cases. Pockets would be nice for the small stuff. I thought the picture showed dividers. It is well-padded on the outside though and everything fits inside with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice case.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for moving scope around. My scope is stored on my second floor so this helps a lot when I set up. One gripe: the carrying straps are oddly placed and the scope is unbalanced when you pick it up. Otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Betz

customer_reviews.title: Good case!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after buying the Orion SkyQuest XT8 Plus Dobsonian Reflector Telescope. The case is just what we were looking for in form, though pricey. Somebody must be turning a profit. Also, obviously, it's not a hard case and won't protect against mishandling.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket218

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection During Storage and Transport
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because my telescope was too big, however I felt the padding was sufficient to provide the additional protection I needed during storage and transport. I was using bubble wrap previously. I had looked at hard cases and DIY plywood ones but these are just too bulky and heavy to be practical. The Orion, with its straps, makes the OTA far easier to handle while off the mount. I've since ordered the larger model and will review it when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this padded case to transport my Orion XT8 Dobsonian Telescope. The construction is of very high quality, with the Orion logo nicely embroidered on it. I used it over Memorial Day weekend for the first time and it made transporting my scope very easy. The scope tube fits in the bag just right and the carrying straps are a little off center so that it balances out the heavier part of the tube that houses the primary mirror. The bag only fits the scope tube...not the dobsonian mounting base, which is carried separately. I highly recommend this padded case if you plan on transporting your telescope with any frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W. Maertz

customer_reviews.title: Star Gazing on the Go
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE bag when you are taking your Orion out into the darkness. The a quarter inch padding surrounding your precious telescope is great for when you are bringing it out. The only thing that I would like to see on this bag are side pockets. It's missing the necessary zip pockets for all of your accessories and lenses. If it had that, it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: StarGazer12

customer_reviews.title: Essential for moving the scope around to different locations
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my Orion XT8 Dobsonian telescope I opted to buy the carrying case also. That was a good decision. Although it is expensive it is also very high quality and prevents the dents and dings from moving the scope from location to location. If you are going to only use the scope in your back yard you probably don't need it but if you are like me and like going to darker locations and star parties then it becomes essential. Well worth the money....
customer_reviews.author: Lauren In Glen Burnie

customer_reviews.title: What to get for the Astronomy Buff in your Life
customer_reviews.text: Gave this case to my astronomy-buff husband and he was delighted. It fit his telescope perfectly and padding, is great.
customer_reviews.author: jan smith

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is for. Does not have any extra pockets.
customer_reviews.text: This bag really worked well for me. I had my Orion XT8 fit nice and comfy in there. If your telescope tube's length stays same, it could fit 10" too. However, there is no additional extra pockets to put small accessories like finder scope or an eyepiece. I would have loved that.
customer_reviews.author: curiousbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds everything but the base.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hold everything needed seems sturdy and easy to carry the telescope. base doesn’t fit in, though.
customer_reviews.author: LORI D FOLEY

customer_reviews.title: Paded Telescope Case for the Orion XT8
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful and easy to use. Straps not centerd on purpose due to a heavier side (on primary mirror side) to balance when carrying it. I recommend it for extra protection. I store my telescope with this case and transport it in my SUV to my camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag very much as we travel and plan to take the scope with us on camping trips. The bag also provides a protective container to keep the scope in at home. I wish the bag had some pockets for storing eyepieces, the finder scope and various tools, red flashlight, etc. I solved that problem by purchasing some inexpensive all-purpose zipper bags from the stationary department of a local superstore ($2.97ea). I bought bright colors so they would be easier to see in the dark. Overall, I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits the XT 8 scope
customer_reviews.text: Well made, balanced properly, although it does seem a tad expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I wished I had ordered this why I bought the telescope. It's a little price but fits perfectly and the handle us offset so it all weigh is balanced. It keeps the tube clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: OgZapper

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Don't listen to the reviews that say the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Don't listen to the reviews that say the handles are wrong! They're just not smart enough to realize the telescope goes in a certain way. It balances perfectly! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: William F. Caton

customer_reviews.title: and is easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I bought this to protect my XT8 during a move. It fits perfectly as long as the finger scope is removed, and is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: B Smitty

customer_reviews.title: awesome, though fabric
customer_reviews.text: awesome, though fabric, if you spent 500 bucks on your telescope like i did, get this , you won;t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great case for my telescope.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say, the case is good and protects your telescope really well. The handling strap is really useful when transporting the telescope to your favorite viewing location. Thank You Orion, you guys (and gals) are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: My Orion xt8 fits great and is easy to handle with the help of ...
customer_reviews.text: Effectively protects scope during travel. My Orion xt8 fits great and is easy to handle with the help of this case. I had hoped the straps and zipper would feel a little more sturdy, but despite the minimalist construction everything has held up find during the handful of road trips where I've used this case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haines

customer_reviews.title: Must have accessory
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine trying to move around this substantial telescope without a cushioned case that has the strap offset to balance the load. It is well made and I couldn't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Qusi

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my 8". I guess I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my 8". I guess I ordered the wrong one?
customer_reviews.author: Geology Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the telescope.
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect - fits the telescope without having to take off the view finders. Well padded for traveling in the car, yet light-weight enough to easily carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case, but...
customer_reviews.text: This case works perfectly at protecting your xt8. Although it is too expensive, thus the reason for only 3 stars. If this case was 30-40 dollars less it would easily be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have. Makes easy work of transport and storage of xt8 tube.
customer_reviews.author: Buckey O'neil

customer_reviews.title: Simple bag
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great purchase buy upon receiving it I realized that is does not include a divider to protect the scope from other pieces. In the literature they speak of an optional divider and straps but am not sure where to find that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: First skeptical....but SOOO glad I bought
customer_reviews.text: This case makes it super easy to transport the XT8!! I'd say a must have...I've tried carrying the scope mounted in it's base. It's just awkward. The handles on this case are long enough to use as shoulder strap! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Matherne

customer_reviews.title: nicely made, but doesn't fit base
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail, so I haven't been able to use it and put it to the test yet. It seems fine, well made, and sturdy. However, I thought it would fit the entire scope, including base. It doesn't. It's mean to fit the tube assembly, not the base. I'll keep it; it looks like it will work really well for transporting the scope. However, I plan to keep the tube mounted on the base at home, and the bag won't fit that. So the bag goes in the closet for now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vandenbosch

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The product is functionaly good but overpriced. If there was a strap to secure it at the waist, carrying the tube around would have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: amlendu shekhar choubey

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a way over priced very disappointing and flimsy product....I felt it offered my daughter's telescope no protection at all and couldn't wait to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Darting Dee

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended for the telescope I purchased
customer_reviews.text: The case itself was everything I wanted, it was the wrong size. It was recommended for the telescope I purchased, so I ended up returning it. Amazon has made returns easy, but I really wanted the bag to work for the (very expensive, but wonderful) telescope. Disappointing and disappointing that it was recommended.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hruska

customer_reviews.title: Well made very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This makes traveling with our Orion a breeze and takes a load off my mind. 5000 miles in our RV and not a dent ding or anything out of alignment! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: hart3856

customer_reviews.title: best experience ever
customer_reviews.text: Great product. apparently somebody tried to open my box :) the tape was teared off and my bag was damaged upon arrival as you can see in the picture. To whom tried to check inside: if you are going to open my package, please use knife next time... scissors are not a good idea. *update on 11/30/20* Orion sent me a replacement right away. Thank you good people of Orion.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: Fits with EZ Finder-II which came with the scope.
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably, feels much more practical than the bare scope when storing. I suggest anyone getting the SkyQuest XT-8 Plus, also grab yourself this case.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Charles Compton

customer_reviews.title: Fit the AD8 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We traveled with our telescope in the back of car about 600 miles. Never had to worry about it getting bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Roadie2

customer_reviews.title: Do Yourself a Favor, Get the Bag
customer_reviews.text: You have a choice to make here. If you plan to leave your scope in the garage, or porch, and if moving it to your view site is easy, then you do not need this bag. It is just a waste of money, and it is bulky. If you plan on transporting the scope to another location, you need the protection of the bag. I don't think I could safely transport my scope without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for my 10” skywatcher Dobsonian. Well designed and makes it so much easier to transport. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ken L.

customer_reviews.title: Padded case adequate, but straps lacking
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this padded case from Orion as far as protection for my Reflector Tube Assembly. However, I am a little disappointed in the way the straps are placed. The straps are too long to carry the case from your hand hanging by your side and when you carry it over your shoulder one end wants to dip down toward the ground. This means you have to really concentrate to be sure that your tube assembly does not bump the ground accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lasnetski

product_meta.title: Orion 15174 47x13.5x18.5 Inches Padded Telescope Case (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Style:SingleThe 47 inch x13.5 inch x18.5 inch Orion Padded Telescope Case provides a convenient means for transporting and storing your telescope. It'll stay cleaner and last longer, free of dings and scrapes. It's made of heavy, water-resistant polyester/nylon material with padding sewn into the inner lining. Full-length zipper allows easy access. Handle straps fit nicely in the hand. Comfortable to carry, forgiving of bumps and bruises, and more space-efficient than boxy hard cases, This telescope case is a smart buy for any telescope owner. Get yours today!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Soft padded case protects your telescope and makes transport and storage easy. Fits optical tube of Orion SkyQuest XT8 Classic Dobsonian, XT8i IntelliScope, and XT8g GoTo Dobsonian reflector telescopes. Made of heavy, water-resistant polyester/nylon material with padding sewn into the inner case lining. Full-length zipper allows easy access for quick deployment and repacking of equipment in the field. Handle straps can easily be slung over your shoulder for convenient transport. Internal case dimensions: 47" L x 13.5" W x 18.5" H
feature_bullets: Soft padded case protects your telescope and makes transport and storage easy
Fits optical tube of Orion SkyQuest XT8 Classic Dobsonian, XT8i IntelliScope, and XT8g GoTo Dobsonian reflector telescopes
Made of heavy, water-resistant polyester/nylon material with padding sewn into the inner case lining
Full-length zipper allows easy access for quick deployment and repacking of equipment in the field. Handle straps can easily be slung over your shoulder for convenient transport
Internal case dimensions: 47" L x 13.5" W x 18.5" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
